page.title: 08Lound and its Old People
page.content: On Monday,17th June 1985,the following questions were put to a group of old people at an afternoon bingo club at Lothingland School. Q.Do you like living in Lound and if so why? A.Yes.It is very peaceful and quiet. Q.What would you like for Lound that it does not already have? A.A village hall. Q.What do you do apart from playing bingo? A.We go shopping in Gt.Yarmouth and Lowestoft. Q.How do you get around? A.We use the bus, sometimes a car. Q.Do you ever go to the pub? A.On special occasions birthdays Xmas. Q.What are your ages? A.Between 63 and 87 years. Q.Who would you most like to meet? A.Cliff Richard.
